comments.body:
This section would be stronger with an over-arching description of what these filters do. I'm guessing a bit on the wording, but something like this:

```suggestion

To find usable IP addresses within an IP range, try these ``ipaddr`` filters:

```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +408,412 @@Finding IP addresses within a range
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

To find usable IP addresses within an IP range, try these ``ipaddr`` filters:
